entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early this afternoon with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023
